Would you tell me how to reproduce this issue? Does this occur in your web application based on BIRT engine API instead of BIRT viewer?
I can not reproduce this bug in BIRT Viewer. because PDF emitter always gets a outputstream instead of a file in BIRT PDF preview.

Accoring to BIRT Engine API, user can set a file or outputstream as output of emitter. File takes precedence. This error looks like that user specifies a non-exist path as output of emitter.

Thanks, I get it.
The path of HTML and PDF is the same. HTML emitter will create the folder if the folder doesn't exist, while PDF emitter don't create it. So the exception throws out.
We should fix it.
